VPSLatch - >> Expands To Europe << VPS with FREE cPanel/WHM - FREE iPod?!? <-- HOT!!!

LATEST UPDATES: VPSLatch is now accepting orders for VPS located in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands.

VPSLatch is now proud to introduce instant cPanel licensing with every VPS package! VPSLatch is now the world's FIRST VPS provider to be able to offer instant setup + licensing on cPanel based VPS! No more waiting around to start hosting!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

What's Included in each VPS account?

Fully Managed
Pre-Hardened
Pre-Optimized
24x7x365 Proactive monitoring
Superb Support
RAID10 protected hard drive space!
Offsite automated backups
SolusVM VPS control panel
Free cPanel/WHM control panel
Free Fantastico
Free Private Nameservers
Instant Setup
Full ROOT Control
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

DISCOUNT! - VOUCHER: EXPANSION: Enjoy a 25% off recurring discount, LIFETIME discount for the life of your VPS! Can be used on any billing cycle!

* NEW * VPSLatch is now officially doing a prize draw every month on every active client. You are free to receive some awesome prizes such as an iPod shuffle, if you get chosen as the winner. Free shipping worldwide so any client regardless of the location can win, see more details here!
